A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 6, 2010''', at 22:20 UTC.<ref name="-2220">{{cite IRC log|DBN|tz=standard|"P4:20:06 <Notch> /indev/'s been fixed to allow deep small levels, and something else I forgot"}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed a bug that caused generating deep small levels to be impossible.<ref name="-2220"/>
